channel.title: grafana on Nicole van der Hoeven
channel.description: Recent content in grafana on Nicole van der Hoeven

item.title: Acquisition talk with CEOs Raj Dutt (Grafana) and Robin Gustafsson (k6) (k6 Office Hours #19)
item.description: This week on k6 Office Hours, Simme and I were joined by two CEOs: k6 CEO Robin Gustafsson and Grafana Labs CEO Raj Dutt. It was a little nerve-wracking to have two CEOs on the stream, but it did give us the opportunity to ask both of them pointed questions on Grafana Labs’s acquisition of k6, including any plans they have for how both companies could integrate better in the future.

item.title: k6 is part of Grafana Labs! AMA with CEO Robin Gustafsson (k6 Office Hours #17)
item.description:
On this week’s Office Hours, Simme and I were joined by Robin Gustafsson, the CEO of k6, to make a big announcement: k6 has been acquired by Grafana Labs.

The folks at Grafana Labs have been fans of k6 for a while, and we’ve been fans (and users) of their work since almost the beginning of k6. While a surprise to many, Grafana and k6 together is a combination that makes sense.

Read Grafana’s press release here to hear more about this milestone.
